# Step-by-Step Description

1\. Load the *Singapore Residents by Planning Area / Subzone, Age Group, Sex and Type of Dwelling, June 2022* csv file into Tableau Desktop.

2\. Tabulate Female and Male population. We created a calculated field for female and male individually.

3\. Create the Matrix for trellis display (3 \* 3 for 9 Planning Areas).

4\. Drag AG to Rows. Female and Male to Columns. Reverse the axis of the Male population group.

5\. Drag Sex to Color Marks Tab.
